panels.description: The highest number of devices connected simultaneously for the selected time period.
panels.title: Peak Audience

panels.description: All of the data transferred over CDN for the selected time period.
panels.title: CDN Traffic

panels.description: All of the data transferred over P2P for the selected time period.
panels.title: P2P Traffic

panels.description: The Total Offload Percentage of the video distribution for the selected time period.
panels.title: Offload

panels.description: The median of the amount of time that takes from loading the connection to the first video frame.
panels.title: Join Time

panels.description: The total of playtime for the selected time period.
panels.title: Total Viewing Time

panels.description: Number of playback sessions within the selected time range, aggregated per time granularity interval.
panels.title: Audience

panels.description: The total number of devices that are getting the best resolution they can represent.
panels.title: Optimal Viewport Resolution

panels.description: The total number of devices that are getting lower resolution than they can represent.
panels.title: Suboptimal Viewport Resolution

panels.description: The time it takes to present the first frame to the viewer after the service finishes loading.
panels.title: Join Time

panels.description: The total number of hours the content is being played over time, per granularity time window.
panels.title: Viewed Hours

panels.description: The average playtime that the content has been consumed by the audience per session over time.
panels.title: Minutes per Play

panels.description: Percentage of BufferingTime during PlayingTime for Devices that have been less than 10 min in a buffering state.
panels.title: Buffering % (< 10 min in Buffering)

panels.description: Percentage of total playing viewers at an optimal/suboptimal viewport resolution, where the "optimal" corresponds to the audience consuming the video representation with a resolution closest to the viewport reported by the video player.
panels.title: Optimal Viewport Percent

panels.description: All of the data transferred over CDN (Content Delivery Network/s).
panels.title: CDN Traffic

panels.description: All of the data transferred over P2P Connections (i.e. coming from Edge Intelligence).
panels.title: P2P Traffic

panels.description: Total audience distribution by connection speed.
panels.title: Connection Speed

panels.description: All the data transferred over the Content Delivery Network pathway(s)
panels.title: CDN Traffic per CDN Label

panels.description: Total audience distribution by Browser for web platforms.
panels.title: Browsers

panels.description: Total audience distribution by Operating Systems.
panels.title: Operating Systems

panels.description: HTTP request from the CDN should be included in the header in order to be available on the chart
panels.title: CDN Traffic per X-CDN Header

panels.description: Total audience distribution by native apps or web media players.
panels.title: Players & Apps

panels.description: Total audience distribution by their connection type.
panels.title: Connection Types

panels.description: Total audience distribution by their ASN (showing separately 'Top 5' + Others).
panels.title: Audience by ASN

panels.description: Total amount of CDN traffic incoming from each ASN (showing separately 'Top 5' + Others).
panels.title: Traffic by ASN: Volume

panels.description: Total traffic volume in percentages from each ASN (showing separately 'Top 5' + Others).
panels.title: Traffic by ASN: Percentage

list.description: Filter by the unique ID of your streaming channel
list.label: Channel Id
list.name: channel_id

list.description: Filter by the streaming URI (Universal Resource Identifier). NOTE: URI is the part of URL link generated for end-users.
list.label: Stream URI
list.name: stream_uri

list.description: Filter by the player's bitrate in bps (bits per second)
list.label: Bitrate
list.name: bitrate

list.label: Type
list.name: stream_state
list.query: LIVE : live , VOD : vod , DVR : dvr

list.description: Dremel data layer (type of Druid's datasource) to interpolate within the datasource name
list.name: data_layer

list.description: Enhanced accuracy level can be selected for queries where Count aggregation is being used. See the documentation for further details.
list.label: Accuracy
list.name: accuracy
